body_html: I've committed an updated name (periodic_intersperse), proper error handling, and more mathematical detail regarding what the transformation does located in the documentation string (tensorflow/contrib/periodic_intersperse/core/ops/array_ops.cc). The math is written in Latex, so I was curious if TF includes MathJax in it's documentation pages. If not, is it possible to specify this in the documentation string?
